Workshops

Health education sessions and evidence-based resources to support community wellbeing.

Outreach

Volunteering and partnerships with community organizations to reduce barriers to care.

Advocacy campaigns

Awareness initiatives highlighting inequities and supporting inclusive systems.

HEART

Health Equity Advocacy Response Team — a York University student-led group advancing health equity through advocacy, education, outreach, and community action.

This is a student-led website and is not an official York University website.
